name: Hero Emblem 2
description:
An original SRPG where the ousted descendant to royalty who
successfully reclaimed her right to the throne in the prequel...
Now sets her sight on freeing her citizens from the shackles of slavery!

A fierce battle against factors supporting and opposing slavery begins...
When will peace return to the lands? ...A good question indeed...

Viva La Revolution! Freedom to the People!

  • The seven heroes have unique abilities.
  • Game difficulty is changeable.
  • New Game+ feature using clear points.
  • 12 different battle roles! / 40 different job classes!
